text: Titia Jisu utu daruga laga ghor te punchise, aru Tai pora basuri baja manu khan9.23 Yehudi niyom hisab te manu mora ghor te, bisi gorib manu khan bhi komsekom duijon basuri baja manu aru ekjon kandibole maiki thaki bole lage eneka thakisele.  aru dangor bhir joma hoi kene hala kori thaka dikhise.
